products.name: Harry Potter Wand
products.description: An authentic replica of Harry Potter's wand. Made of resin and perfect for any fan.

products.name: Hermione Granger Wand
products.description: A replica of Hermione Granger's wand, crafted with detail and perfect for any witch or wizard.

products.name: Dumbledore's Elder Wand
products.description: The most powerful wand in the wizarding world, a replica of the Elder Wand used by Dumbledore.

products.name: Voldemort's Wand
products.description: A sinister replica of Voldemort's wand, perfect for dark magic enthusiasts.

products.name: Ron Weasley's Wand
products.description: A detailed replica of Ron Weasley's wand, perfect for any fan of the red-haired Gryffindor.

products.name: Gryffindor House Scarf
products.description: A warm scarf in the colors of Gryffindor House. Show your pride for the brave house.

products.name: Slytherin House Scarf
products.description: A stylish scarf in the colors of Slytherin House. Ideal for ambitious wizards.

products.name: Ravenclaw House Scarf
products.description: A scarf in the colors of Ravenclaw House for the intellectually curious.

products.name: Hufflepuff House Scarf
products.description: A warm scarf in the colors of Hufflepuff House, perfect for loyal wizards and witches.

products.name: Gryffindor Quidditch Robe
products.description: A high-quality replica of the Gryffindor Quidditch team robe.

products.name: Marauder's Map
products.description: A magical map of Hogwarts showing all its secret passages and the locations of people inside.

products.name: Time-Turner Necklace
products.description: A stunning replica of Hermione Granger's Time-Turner. Perfect for cosplay or everyday wear.

products.name: Hogwarts Express Ticket
products.description: An exact replica of the Hogwarts Express ticket. Great for collectors.

products.name: Hogwarts Trunk Set
products.description: A full-sized replica of the Hogwarts trunk used by students, complete with house crest.

products.name: Hogwarts House Keychain Set
products.description: A set of 4 keychains, each featuring the crest of a Hogwarts house.

products.name: Golden Snitch
products.description: A detailed replica of the Golden Snitch from Quidditch. Comes with a stand for display.

products.name: Triwizard Tournament Cup
products.description: A high-quality replica of the Triwizard Tournament Cup, with glowing effect.

products.name: Hogwarts Crest Wall Banner
products.description: A large wall banner featuring the Hogwarts crest. Perfect for decoration.

products.name: Hogwarts Castle Replica
products.description: A detailed and intricate model of Hogwarts Castle. Perfect for display.

products.name: Hogwarts House Crest Pins
products.description: A set of collectible pins featuring the crests of all four Hogwarts houses.

products.name: Hedwig Plush
products.description: A soft and cuddly plush version of Harry Potter's loyal owl, Hedwig.

products.name: Niffler Plush
products.description: A cute plush of the mischievous Niffler from Fantastic Beasts.

products.name: Chocolate Frog
products.description: A replica of the famous Chocolate Frog, complete with collectible card.

products.name: Bertie Bott's Every Flavour Beans
products.description: A box of Bertie Bott's Every Flavour Beans, containing both delicious and questionable flavors.

products.name: Fawkes Plush
products.description: A soft plush version of Fawkes, Dumbledore's loyal phoenix.

products.name: Sorting Hat
products.description: A replica of the magical Sorting Hat, complete with sound effects.

products.name: Buckbeak Figure
products.description: A detailed figure of Buckbeak, the Hippogriff from the Harry Potter series.

products.name: Hogwarts Snow Globe
products.description: A magical snow globe featuring Hogwarts Castle. Shake to see a snowfall over the castle.

products.name: Dobby Plush
products.description: A soft and detailed plush of Dobby the house-elf, a loyal companion.

products.name: Nimbus 2000 Broomstick
products.description: A replica of the Nimbus 2000, Harry Potter's first broomstick.
